hero.title: S&S Messebau – Exhibition Stands 20–200 m²
hero.subtitle: Full-service exhibition construction from NRW – 48h quote with 3D visualization
cta.free3d.desc: Request your custom 3D visualization now – completely free and non-binding. Within 5 business days, you'll receive a photorealistic rendering of your exhibition stand.
blog.title: Blog & Guide – Exhibition Tips from S&S Messebau
blog.subtitle: Helpful tips, checklists and expert knowledge about exhibition construction, event planning and successful trade show appearances.
blog.cta.title: Have questions about your exhibition project?
blog.cta.subtitle: Our experts are happy to personally advise you on all aspects of your trade show appearance.
branchen.title: Industry Expertise – Exhibition Construction for Food, Finance & Industry
branchen.subtitle: Specialized in the requirements of mid-sized companies in Food, Insurance and Industry. We know your sector and understand what matters.
branchen.expertise.title: Why Industry Expertise Matters
branchen.expertise.subtitle: Every industry has specific requirements. We know them and deliver accordingly.
leistungen.title: Exhibition Services – Full Service from 20–200 m²
leistungen.subtitle: From the initial idea to professional dismantling – we accompany you through every phase of your exhibition project. Our full-service approach saves time, costs and stress.
sustainability.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction
sustainability.subtitle: Environmentally conscious, cost-efficient, future-oriented – our approach to sustainable exhibition construction.
sustainability.reuse.desc: Modular stand systems that can be used across multiple trade shows – saving materials and costs.
sustainability.materials.desc: FSC-certified wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials for an environmentally conscious presentation.
sustainability.logistics.desc: Optimized transport planning and bundled deliveries reduce CO₂ emissions.
sustainability.savings.desc: From the 2nd trade show onwards, sustainable systems pay for themselves – good for the environment and your budget.
sustainability.branchen.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction for Every Industry
sustainability.branchen.subtitle: Environmentally conscious trade show presence – without compromising quality and impact.
sustainability.branchen.reuse.desc: Modular stands that can be used multiple times – saving up to 60% of materials.
sustainability.branchen.materials.desc: FSC wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials as standard.
sustainability.branchen.logistics.desc: Regional partners, bundled transports and CO₂-optimized planning.
sustainability.branchen.savings.desc: Sustainable systems pay for themselves from the 2nd trade show.

calculator.level.standard.desc: Solid system stand with a professional appearance
